verses.verse: And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3972>Paul,<s%> earnestly <S%G816>beholding<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4892>council,<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G435>Men<s%> and <S%G80>brethren,<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> have <S%G4176>lived<s%> in <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G4893>conscience<s%> before <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G891>unto<s%> <S%G5026>this<s%> <S%G2250>day.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> high <S%G749>priest<s%> <S%G367>Ananias<s%> <S%G2004>commanded<s%> them that stood <S%G3936>by<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> to <S%G5180>smite<s%> <S%G848>him<s%> on <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4750>mouth.<s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3195>shall<s%> <S%G5180>smite<s%> <S%G4571>thee,<s%> thou <S%G2867>whited<s%> <S%G5109>wall:<s%> <S%G2532>for<s%> <S%G2521>sittest<s%> <S%G4771>thou<s%> to <S%G2919>judge<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3551>law,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2753>commandest<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%> to be <S%G5180>smitten<s%> contrary to the <S%G3891>law?<s%>
And <S%G1161><s%> they that stood <S%G3936>by<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G3058>Revilest<s%> thou <S%G2316>God's<s%> high <S%G749>priest?<s%>

Then <S%G5037><s%> <S%G5346>said<s%> <S%G3972>Paul,<s%> I <S%G1492>wist<s%> <S%G3756>not,<s%> <S%G80>brethren,<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> he <S%G2076>was<s%> the high <S%G749>priest:<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> it is <S%G1125>written,<s%> Thou shalt <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2046>speak<s%> <S%G2560>evil<s%> of the <S%G758>ruler<s%> of <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G2992>people.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G1097>perceived<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G3313>part<s%> <S%G2076>were<s%> <S%G4523>Sadducees,<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2087>other<s%> <S%G5330>Pharisees,<s%> he cried <S%G2896>out<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4892>council,<s%> <S%G435>Men<s%> and <S%G80>brethren,<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G1510>am<s%> a <S%G5330>Pharisee,<s%> the <S%G5207>son<s%> of a <S%G5330>Pharisee:<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> the <S%G1680>hope<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G386>resurrection<s%> of the <S%G3498>dead<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> am called in <S%G2919>question.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G846>he<s%> had <S%G5124>so<s%> <S%G2980>said,<s%> there <S%G1096>arose<s%> a <S%G4714>dissension<s%> between <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4523>Sadducees:<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4128>multitude<s%> was <S%G4977>divided.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3303>the<s%> <S%G4523>Sadducees<s%> <S%G3004>say<s%> that there <S%G1511>is<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G386>resurrection,<s%> <S%G3366>neither<s%> <S%G32>angel,<s%> <S%G3383>nor<s%> <S%G4151>spirit:<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G3670>confess<s%> <S%G297>both.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> there <S%G1096>arose<s%> a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G2906>cry:<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1122>scribes<s%> that were of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5330>Pharisees'<s%> <S%G3313>part<s%> <S%G450>arose,<s%> and <S%G1264>strove,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> We <S%G2147>find<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G2556>evil<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5129>this<s%> <S%G444>man:<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> a <S%G4151>spirit<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> an <S%G32>angel<s%> hath <S%G2980>spoken<s%> to <S%G846>him,<s%> let us <S%G3361>not<s%> fight against <S%G2313>God.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> when there <S%G1096>arose<s%> a <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G4714>dissension,<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> chief <S%G5506>captain,<s%> <S%G2125>fearing<s%> <S%G3361>lest<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> should have been pulled in <S%G1288>pieces<s%> <S%G5259>of<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G2753>commanded<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4753>soldiers<s%> to go <S%G2597>down,<s%> and to take him by <S%G726>force<s%> <S%G846><s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G3319>among<s%> <S%G848>them,<s%> <S%G5037>and<s%> to <S%G71>bring<s%> him <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3925>castle.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3571>night<s%> <S%G1966>following<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> stood <S%G2186>by<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> and <S%G2036>said,<s%> Be of good <S%G2293>cheer,<s%> Paul: <S%G3972><s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> thou hast <S%G1263>testified<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> <S%G1700>me<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2419>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G4571>thou<s%> bear <S%G3140>witness<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1519>at<s%> Rome. <S%G4516><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> when it <S%G1096>was<s%> <S%G2250>day,<s%> <S%G5100>certain<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2453>Jews<s%> banded <S%G4160>together,<s%> <S%G4963><s%> and bound themselves under a <S%G332>curse,<s%> <S%G1438><s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%> that they would <S%G3383>neither<s%> <S%G5315>eat<s%> <S%G3383>nor<s%> <S%G4095>drink<s%> <S%G2193>till<s%> <S%G3757><s%> they had <S%G615>killed<s%> <S%G3972>Paul.<s%>
And <S%G1161><s%> they <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G4119>more<s%> than <S%G5062>forty<s%> which had <S%G4160>made<s%> <S%G5026>this<s%> <S%G4945>conspiracy.<s%>

And <S%G3748>they<s%> <S%G4334>came<s%> to <S%G3588>the<s%> chief <S%G749>priests<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4245>elders,<s%> and <S%G2036>said,<s%> We have bound ourselves under a great <S%G332>curse,<s%> <S%G1438><s%> <S%G331><s%> that we will <S%G1089>eat<s%> <S%G3367>nothing<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> <S%G3757><s%> we have <S%G615>slain<s%> <S%G3972>Paul.<s%>

Now <S%G3568><s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4892>council<s%> <S%G1718>signify<s%> to <S%G3588>the<s%> chief <S%G5506>captain<s%> <S%G3704>that<s%> he bring him <S%G2609>down<s%> <S%G846><s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G839>tomorrow,<s%> as <S%G5613>though<s%> ye <S%G3195>would<s%> <S%G1231>inquire<s%> something more <S%G197>perfectly<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> <S%G846>him:<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G2249>we,<s%> or <S%G4253>ever<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> come <S%G1448>near,<s%> <S%G2070>are<s%> <S%G2092>ready<s%> to <S%G337>kill<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G3972>Paul's<s%> <S%G79>sister's<s%> <S%G5207>son<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> of their lying in <S%G1749>wait,<s%> he <S%G3854>went<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3925>castle,<s%> and <S%G518>told<s%> <S%G3972>Paul.<s%>

Then <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> called one of the centurions <S%G4341>unto<s%> <S%G1520><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1543><s%> him, and <S%G5346>said,<s%> <S%G520>Bring<s%> <S%G5126>this<s%> young <S%G3494>man<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> chief <S%G5506>captain:<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> he <S%G2192>hath<s%> a certain <S%G5100>thing<s%> to <S%G518>tell<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>

So <S%G3767><s%> <S%G3588>he<s%> <S%G3303><s%> <S%G3880>took<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> and <S%G71>brought<s%> him <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> chief <S%G5506>captain,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5346>said,<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1198>prisoner<s%> called me <S%G4341>unto<s%> <S%G3165><s%> him, and <S%G2065>prayed<s%> me to <S%G71>bring<s%> <S%G5126>this<s%> young <S%G3494>man<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G4571>thee,<s%> who <S%G2192>hath<s%> <S%G5100>something<s%> to <S%G2980>say<s%> unto <S%G4671>thee.<s%>

Then <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> chief <S%G5506>captain<s%> <S%G1949>took<s%> <S%G848>him<s%> by <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5495>hand,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> went with him <S%G402>aside<s%> <S%G2596>privately,<s%> <S%G2398><s%> and <S%G4441>asked<s%> him, <S%G5101>What<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> thou <S%G2192>hast<s%> to <S%G518>tell<s%> <S%G3427>me?<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G3588>The<s%> <S%G2453>Jews<s%> have <S%G4934>agreed<s%> to <S%G2065>desire<s%> <S%G4571>thee<s%> <S%G3704>that<s%> thou wouldest bring <S%G2609>down<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G839>tomorrow<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4892>council,<s%> as <S%G5613>though<s%> they <S%G3195>would<s%> <S%G4441>inquire<s%> <S%G5100>somewhat<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> more <S%G197>perfectly.<s%>

But <S%G3767><s%> do <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G4771>thou<s%> <S%G3982>yield<s%> unto <S%G846>them:<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> there lie in <S%G1748>wait<s%> for <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G4119>more<s%> than <S%G5062>forty<s%> <S%G435>men,<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> have bound themselves with an <S%G332>oath,<s%> <S%G1438><s%> that they will <S%G3383>neither<s%> <S%G5315>eat<s%> <S%G3383>nor<s%> <S%G4095>drink<s%> <S%G2193>till<s%> <S%G3757><s%> they have <S%G337>killed<s%> <S%G846>him:<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> <S%G1526>are<s%> they <S%G2092>ready,<s%> looking <S%G4327>for<s%> a <S%G1860>promise<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G4675>thee.<s%>

So <S%G3767><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> chief <S%G5506>captain<s%> <S%G3303>then<s%> let the young man <S%G630>depart,<s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3494><s%> and <S%G3853>charged<s%> him, See thou <S%G1583>tell<s%> no <S%G3367>man<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> thou hast <S%G1718>showed<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G3165>me.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he called <S%G4341>unto<s%> him <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G1543>centurions,<s%> <S%G2036>saying,<s%> Make <S%G2090>ready<s%> two <S%G1250>hundred<s%> <S%G4757>soldiers<s%> <S%G3704>to<s%> <S%G4198>go<s%> <S%G2193>to<s%> <S%G2542>Caesarea,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2460>horsemen<s%> threescore and <S%G1440>ten,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1187>spearmen<s%> two <S%G1250>hundred,<s%> <S%G575>at<s%> the <S%G5154>third<s%> <S%G5610>hour<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3571>night;<s%>

And <S%G5037><s%> <S%G3936>provide<s%> them <S%G2934>beasts,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> they may set Paul <S%G1913>on,<s%> <S%G3972><s%> and bring him <S%G1295>safe<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G5344>Felix<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2232>governor.<s%>
And he <S%G1125>wrote<s%> a <S%G1992>letter<s%> <S%G4023>after<s%> <S%G5126>this<s%> manner: <S%G5179><s%>
Claudius <S%G2804><s%> <S%G3079>Lysias<s%> unto <S%G3588>the<s%> most <S%G2903>excellent<s%> <S%G2232>governor<s%> <S%G5344>Felix<s%> sendeth <S%G5463>greeting.<s%>

This <S%G5126><s%> <S%G435>man<s%> was <S%G4815>taken<s%> <S%G5259>of<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2453>Jews,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3195>should<s%> have been <S%G337>killed<s%> <S%G5259>of<s%> <S%G846>them:<s%> then <S%G2186>came<s%> I <S%G4862>with<s%> an <S%G4753>army,<s%> and <S%G1807>rescued<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> having <S%G3129>understood<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> he <S%G2076>was<s%> a <S%G4514>Roman.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> when I <S%G1014>would<s%> have <S%G1097>known<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G156>cause<s%> <S%G1223>wherefore<s%> <S%G3739><s%> they <S%G1458>accused<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> I brought him <S%G2609>forth<s%> <S%G846><s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G848>their<s%> council: <S%G4892><s%>

Whom <S%G3739><s%> I <S%G2147>perceived<s%> to be <S%G1458>accused<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> <S%G2213>questions<s%> of <S%G848>their<s%> <S%G3551>law,<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> to <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3367>nothing<s%> laid to his <S%G1462>charge<s%> <S%G514>worthy<s%> of <S%G2288>death<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> of <S%G1199>bonds.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> when it was <S%G3377>told<s%> <S%G3427>me<s%> how <S%G5259>that<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2453>Jews<s%> laid <S%G1917>wait<s%> <S%G3195><s%> <S%G1510><s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G435>man,<s%> I <S%G3992>sent<s%> <S%G1824>straightway<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G4571>thee,<s%> and gave <S%G3853>commandment<s%> to his <S%G2725>accusers<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> to <S%G3004>say<s%> <S%G1909>before<s%> <S%G4675>thee<s%> <S%G3588>what<s%> they had <S%G4314>against<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%> <S%G4517>Farewell.<s%>

Then <S%G3767><s%> <S%G3303><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4757>soldiers,<s%> <S%G2596>as<s%> it was <S%G1299>commanded<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G353>took<s%> <S%G3972>Paul,<s%> and <S%G71>brought<s%> him <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G3571>night<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G494>Antipatris.<s%>

On <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1887>morrow<s%> they <S%G1439>left<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2460>horsemen<s%> to <S%G4198>go<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> and <S%G5290>returned<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> castle: <S%G3925><s%>

Who, <S%G3748><s%> when they <S%G1525>came<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2542>Caesarea,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G325>delivered<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1992>epistle<s%> to <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2232>governor,<s%> <S%G3936>presented<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> before <S%G846>him.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2232>governor<s%> had <S%G314>read<s%> the letter, <S%G2532>he<s%> <S%G1905>asked<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G4169>what<s%> <S%G1885>province<s%> he <S%G2076>was.<s%> <S%G2532>And<s%> when he <S%G4441>understood<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> he was <S%G575>of<s%> <S%G2791>Cilicia;<s%>

I will <S%G1251>hear<s%> <S%G4675>thee,<s%> <S%G5346>said<s%> he, <S%G3752>when<s%> <S%G4675>thine<s%> <S%G2725>accusers<s%> are <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3854>come.<s%> <S%G5037>And<s%> he <S%G2753>commanded<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> to be <S%G5442>kept<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2264>Herod's<s%> judgment <S%G4232>hall.<s%>
